title: Just the Fracks, Ma'am: The TRUTH about hydrofracking and the next great American boom
features: How does fracking affect our children, grandchildren and future generations?In Just the Fracks Ma'am Greg Kozera takes the mystery out of the fracking process. He explains a very technical process and issues associated with it in a way that they are easily understood by non-technical people. Greg is a master story teller and uses stories to make fracking understandable and his book memorable.
description: "This is a great first read for those wanting to understand hydraulic fracturing.  Greg takes a complex topic and makes it understandable."
President Independent Pertoleum Association of America (IPAA)

is a father, grandfather, professional engineer with a Masters in Environmental Engineering and environmentalist with over 35 years of experience in the natural gas and oil industry.  He is also the President of the Virginia Oil and Gas Association.  Greg has worked in the field on the frack crews, done the engineering designs for fracks and has managed facilities with more than 200 employees.  He has actually seen the fracks created deep in the ground.  Greg understands the fracturing process and how important it is to our children, our grandchildren and the security of our nation.
